content.body:
### Shop 215/45R17 Tires The 215/45R17 is a tire that’s found almost exclusively on subcompacts, as well as a few smaller crossovers. While it’s a tire size that was common on older makes and models, it can still be found on a few vehicles today. This is a tire size you’ll see on vehicles like the Acura ILX, Hyundai Veloster, Kia Forte, Lexus CT200h, Subaru BRZ, and Toyota Prius, and brand-new versions of these vehicles often roll out of the factory with a set of Michelin Pilot MXM4, Nexen N’Priz AH8, Hankook Optimo (H426), Michelin Primacy HP, or [Bridgestone Ecopia EP422 Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/ecopia-ep422-plus) tires attached. Popular vehicles: 2013-2022 Acura ILX
2012-2021 Hyundai Veloster
2010-2018 Kia Forte
2011-2017 Lexus CT200h
2013-2022 Subaru BRZ
2010-2022 Toyota Prius Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Check out the [Pirelli Cinturato P7 All Season Plus 2](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/cinturato-p7-all-season-plus-2), Yokohama Avid Ascend LX, Firestone Champion Fuel Fighter, and Nokian One if you’re looking for a set of 215/45R17 tires that can do it all. A sporty car like the Hyundai Veloster or Subaru BRZ might want to accelerate quicker, making ultra-high-performance all-season tires a good choice. Consider the Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS, Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, [Toyo Proxes Sport A/S](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/proxes-sport-a-s), and Hankook Ventus S1 Noble 2 (H452) if you want a set of 215/45R17 tires that’s engineered to help your ride push the envelope. While all-season tires work year-round, they do tend to struggle in moderate to severe ice, slush, and snow. You might need a set of dedicated winter tires if you live in a part of the country that deals with these conditions throughout the winter moths, so take a look at the Bridgestone Blizzak WS90, Nokian Nordan 7, [General Altimax Arctic 12](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-arctic-12), and Falken Winterpeak F-Ice 1 to help you get through tough winter weather. Whether you drive an Acura ILX, Hyundai Veloster, Toyota Prius or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 215/45R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
